title: Shockholm Syndrome: Why We Love Horror

media:group.media:title: Shockholm Syndrome: Why We Love Horror
media:group.media:description:
Fear is an unpleasant emotion that most of us seek to avoid, so why do we like horror? Let's look at the psychology of fear and what draws us towards the spooky.
